DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine efficacy safety biweekly scheme Capecitabine Irinotecan , plus bevacizumab patient metastatic colorectal cancer . - Capecitabine : 1000 mg/m2 , bid , oral , day 2-8 . Every 2 week - Irinotecan : 175 mg/m2 , iv infusion 90 minute , day 1 , every 2 week - Bevacizumab : 5 mg/kg day 1 , every 2 Weeks
